description.value:
Demons debase all they touch. One of your ancestors fell victim to their corruption, and you are burdened by that sin.

Spell Listdivine
Bloodline SkillsIntimidation, Religion
Granted Spellscantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Splash]{Acid Splash}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fear]{Fear}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Slow]{Slow}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Wrath]{Divine Wrath}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Abyssal Plague]{Abyssal Plague}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Disintegrate]{Disintegrate}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Decree]{Divine Decree}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Aura]{Divine Aura}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Implosion]{Implosion}
Bloodline Spellsinitial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Glutton's Jaw]{Glutton's Jaw}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Swamp of Sloth]{Swamp of Sloth}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Abyssal Wrath]{Abyssal Wrath}>
Blood MagicThe corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses or makes you more imposing. Either a target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round, or you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.
